name: Janet Lynch
coverLetter:
I've been cultivating full time for five years. Experienced with indoor and outdoor grows. I can trim 1-1 1/2 pounds per day. I'm staying in Portland. If relocating temporarily I would need accommodations. Please consider that I have three dogs and if I were to relocate I would need to bring them with me. Avail 10/15/17 onward. Looking for short or long term opportunities. Interested in expending on my knowledge of the overall cannabis business.

Thank you for taking the time to review my resume.
